long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blur sensitive data on a website to hide it from others.

It is very simple. Just select the sensitive areas on the website and they are directly blurred.

Quick start:
1. Click on the extension's icon in the toolbar 
2. Click on the "Start Selection" button to start the selection of sensitive data
3. When you are done just press esc or any other key on your keyboard. The blur will remain until the next reload of the page.
